document.full_text: chris paul had 27 points, 15 assists and 13 rebounds, and the new orleans hornets held on to even their first-round playoff series at 2-2.
document.title: hornets 93, lakers 88: paul's triple-double lifts hornets past lakers
lines_and_colors: chris paul had 27 points, 15 assists and 13 rebounds, and the new orleans hornets held on to even their first-round playoff series at 2-2.
